skillTree.localised_description: "Drop these seeds into your garden and your harvest shall be bountiful indeed! But pick not the eye-laden stalk, not even once!"
Into the boughs and under the snow, where the witches dance and the new spring grows.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can pass through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: A root to bind arrows to the earth and a simple switch of wood from a young sprout to return their magics to the spring from which it came.
"Rise now, twisted branch and mossy stone!"
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The rasp of wood, freely given, upon snow heralds their approach...

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Familiars of the wood bound and leap between the shadows, ready to strike out if the deal is deemed sour.

effects.description:
Attribute: Stalk for Things in the Woods and Incarnate Elemental of Beasts units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -20% for Things in the Woods, Incarnate Elemental of Beasts, Bear, Frost Wyrm and Forest Animals units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Of all the twisting of the Winds, curses come most naturally to the Hags.
A leader is best appointed with a wise advisor by their side… One that knows the proper ways of the world.

effects.description:
Ability number of uses: +1 for "Potion of Toughness"
	(accompanying Lord)
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Doom & Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Bear them close to your heart, for the wild holds sole domain over you now.

effects.description: Protective Charms action: Attrition suffered is modified by an additional -10%
Protective Charms action: Attrition suffered is modified by an additional -20%
Protective Charms action: Attrition suffered is modified by an additional -30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: A slightest pinch of hate to make the curse just that much harder to bear.

effects.description: Hag's Cursemark action: Additional 3% success chance
Hag's Cursemark action: Additional 8% success chance
Hag's Cursemark action: Additional 15% success chance

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
